description: This is a very simple example using Power BI Sidetools DAX generator
author: Didier Terrien
instructions: Choose a name for your measure clicking on 'Measure name'
Click on 'Parameter 1' and select a table from your model
Click on 'Create / update' button to create a measure in your model
Click on 'Debug' button to start a debug session with DAX debugger

parameters.description: Defines the name of generated measure DAX generator will create (click to modify)
Select the table we wish to use the CountRows function on (click to modify)
Name of folder that the measure will be placed in. (click to modify)

parameters.defaultValue: Counts the number of rows in the table.
parameters.description: Add a description for this measure. (click to modify)
